Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite

Class DynamicSpriteEntity

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.YaegerEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite.SpriteEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite.DynamicSpriteEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, ContinuousRotatable, EventInitiator, GameNode, BufferedMovable, DirectionProvider, MotionModifier, Movable, Rotatable, SpeedProvider, Placeable, Removable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.media.ResourceConsumer, DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator
public abstract class DynamicSpriteEntity
extends SpriteEntity
implements UpdateDelegator, BufferedMovable, ContinuousRotatable
A DynamicSpriteEntity extends all behaviour of a SpriteEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • DynamicSpriteEntity

      protected DynamicSpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D initialLocation)
      Create a new DynamicSpriteEntity for the given image resource on the given Coordinate2D. This DynamicSpriteEntity will use the original dimensions of the image.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      initialLocation - the initial Coordinate2D of this Entity

    • DynamicSpriteEntity

      protected DynamicSpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D initialLocation, int rows, int columns)
      Create a new DynamicSpriteEntity for the given image resource on the given Coordinate2D. This DynamicSpriteEntity will use the original dimensions of the image.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      initialLocation - the initial Coordinate2D of this Entity
      rows - the number of rows the Image contains
      columns - the number of columns the Image contains

    • DynamicSpriteEntity

      protected DynamicSpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D initialLocation, Size size)
      Create a new DynamicSpriteEntity for the given image resource on the given Coordinate2D, with the given Size.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      initialLocation - the initial Coordinate2D of this Entity
      size - the Size (width and height) with which the image should be shown. This Size will also be used as the BoundingBox in case of collision detection

    • DynamicSpriteEntity

      protected DynamicSpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D initialLocation, Size size, int rows, int columns)
      Create a new DynamicSpriteEntity for the given image resource on the given Coordinate2D, with the given Size.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      initialLocation - the initial Coordinate2D of this entity
      size - the Size (width and height) that should be used. The height and width divided by the number of rows and columns will be used for displaying the Image and as the BoundingBox in case of collision detection.
      rows - the number of rows the Image contains
      columns - the number of columns the Image contains

  • Method Details

    • setAutoCycle

      protected void setAutoCycle​(long interval)
      Set the interval at which the sprite should be automatically cycled.
      Parameters:
      interval - the interval in milli-seconds

    • setAutoCycle

      protected void setAutoCycle​(long interval, int row)
      Set the interval at which the sprite should be automatically cycled. The sprite will cycle through one row of sprites, from left to right.
      Parameters:
      interval - the interval in milli-seconds
      row - the row to cycle through. This value is zero based; if a value of -1 is used, all sprites are cycled through

    • setAutoCycleRow

      protected void setAutoCycleRow​(int row)
      Set the row through which the sprite should be automatically cycled.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to cycle through. This value is zero based; if a value of -1 is used, all sprites are cycled through

    • update

      public final void update​(long timestamp)
      Description copied from interface: Updatable
      The update() method is called each frame.

      Use this method to init frame-based behaviour to the game-object.

      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp of this update

    • addToEntityCollection

      public void addToEntityCollection​(EntityCollection collection)
      Description copied from class: YaegerEntity
      Add this YaegerEntity to the EntityCollection, which will make it part of the YaegerGame. Since an EntityCollection contains different lists of Entities, a YaegerEntity itself is responsible for knowing to which list it should be added. Note that this method is for internal use only and should not be used when creating a YaegerGame
      Overrides:
      addToEntityCollection in class YaegerEntity
      Parameters:
      collection - the EntityCollection to which this YaegerEntity should add itself

    • setRotationSpeed

      public void setRotationSpeed​(double rotationAngle)
      Description copied from interface: ContinuousRotatable
      Set the angle at which this YaegerEntity will bew rotated at each update. Note that a positive rotation value rotates the YaegerEntity counter clockwise, and a negative value rotates the YaegerEntity clockwise.
      Specified by:
      setRotationSpeed in interface ContinuousRotatable
      Parameters:
      rotationAngle - the angle as a double
